attributes.title: Token Launch
attributes.description: Launching Token Stonks on the Binance Smart Chain network. Token has native, passive reflections for holders.

attributes.title: Staking
attributes.description: Staking allows Token holders to receive revenue from the stonks exchange.

attributes.title: DAO
attributes.description: DAO allows project development to be decided by Stonks token holders.

attributes.title: Trading Bot: Snipe
attributes.description: The mechanism enables efficient and scheduled purchase of tokens on the BSC network.

attributes.title: Charts, Swap & Limit Orders on BSC
attributes.description: And DEX interface with capabilities and design like the classic exchanges. In the first step, support for Binance Smart Chain.

attributes.title: Crypto derivatives: Options on BSC
attributes.description: Options for cryptocurrencies based on nobel award Black-Scholes model.

attributes.title: Trading Bot: Automated investment strategies
attributes.description: Extensive, scheduled, custom operations on DEXes.

attributes.title: Trading Bot: Market monitor
attributes.description: Watcher for new tokens, dips, rises, and market analytics.

attributes.title: Stonks Token: ETH & Bridge
attributes.description: Stonks token on Ethereum network with bridge between Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain.

attributes.title: Options: ETH
attributes.description: Ethereum network support for cryptocurrency options.

attributes.title: Stonks-Fiat Gate
attributes.description: Buy Stonks token directly with fiat.

attributes.title: The Stonks Chain
attributes.description: Stonks Chain is a common layer designed to tokenize assets, primarily cryptocurrencies.
